text: The 2017 ZS-Sports China International Challenger was a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It was the 2nd edition of the tournament which was part of the 2017 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Qingdao, China between 17 and 23 April 2017. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Jordan Thompson |78 |1 |- | |Janko Tipsarević |90 |2 |- | |Luca Vanni |122 |3 |- | |Blaž Kavčič |128 |4 |- | |Quentin Halys |137 |5 |- | |Mathias Bourgue |151 |6 |- | |Andrej Martin |153 |7 |- | |Teymuraz Gabashvili |159 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of April 10, 2017. ===Other entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * Bai Yan * He Yecong * Sun Fajing * Wang Aoxiong The following player received entry into the singles main draw using a protected ranking: * Daniel Muñoz de la Nava The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Félix Auger- Aliassime * Denys Molchanov * Oscar Otte * Peter Torebko ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Janko Tipsarević def. Oscar Otte 6–3, 7–6(11–9). ===Doubles=== * Gero Kretschmer / Alexander Satschko def. Andreas Mies / Oscar Otte 2–6, 7–6(8–6), [10–3]. ZS-Sports China International Challenger Category:2017 in Chinese sport Category:Sport in Qingdao
title: 2017 ZS-Sports China International Challenger
